snippet.title: Line War Trailer - November 2021
snippet.description:
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309610/Line_War/ - LINE WAR is a new multiplayer RTS game coming to Steam Early Access Q1 2022. Line War features a new way to command units by drawing commands in the world that the AI of units will respond and act according to. 

To find out more about LINE WAR, visit http://www.linewar.com and don't forget to wishlist this game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309610/Line_War/ - as a small development team of two, we are very eager and excited to bring LINE WAR to Early Access.
